Item.Content: Hint: Challenge Story Dungeon may receive all kinds of different gems and equipment
Hint: You can open the Auto Kill setting page while tapping on the status above the character’s head when using autobot
Hint: You may auto save approximately 12 hours of EXP during Meditation training, offline mode supported
Hint: Upgrading skill may increase the effect of skill as well
Hint: Activate achievement title to permanently increase character’s Battle Point
Hint: Activating wing’s star rank and level rank may highly increase Battle Point
Hint: Strengthen equipment may receive special glamorous lighting effects and increase its attributes
Hint: Blessing may allow you to receive a large amount of powerful equipment and precious items
Hint: Free x1 blessing on every 36 hours
Hint: Activate Horoscope will permanently increase character’s Battle Point
Hint: Complete daily task to receive large amount of EXP and Star soul
Hint: Equipment Append will bring additional attributes
Hint: Activating Military Rank may permanently increase character’s Battle Point
Hint: Easily obtain large amount of EXP by challenging EXP dungeon
Hint: Bound gold may fall off when you kill Monsters delivering the Golds in the Kill Gold dungeon
Hint: Recruit team mates to challenge team dungeon, the gem of creation awaits your collection
Hint: Challenge The Demonic Tower is the main route to receive Feather, Hawk’s Spark
Hint: main map will refresh new elite monsters every 30 minutes
Hint: Tap and hold the Skill bar and move outwards to switch skill settings
Hint: May rebirth at the Warrior’s Land [Rebirth Ambassador· Lazaar] when reached level 100
Hint: The Ladyboss Laiyah in the Warrior’s Land sells [ Life Potion] and [Magic Potion]
Hint: You can check all your currency value and currency consumption in [Character]- [Token]
Hint : World BOSS and Even BOSS will drop equipments that are not bound
Hint: 5% of trading tax will be collected from items sold in the trading center
Hint: Use and recycle unwanted equipments into Crystal, you may exchange other precious items.
Hint: using EXP seal in the Ancient Battlefield will allow you to win easily with less effort
Tips: Having any 3 Rebirth level 1 character in the account can create a Duel Master.
Tips: Duel Master not only have his own exclusive equipments, they can also equip Swordsman, and Magician’s Equipment
Tips: Duel Master can carry 2 single handed cane
Tips: Duel Master can become a power Duel Master or Wisdom Duel Master by adjusting the distribution of Power, and Wisdom attribute.
Tips: Duel Masster can only choose Power Duel Master’s skills when carrying Physical Damage Weapon
Tips: Duel Masster can only choose Magic Duel Master’s skills when carrying Magic Damage Weapon
Tips: Item of engagement will only upgrade character’s attribute when married.
Tips: Nurture item of engagement not only upgrade self attribute, 30% of the item’s attribute will be increased for the companion
Tips: Challenge Couple Dungeon in the Marriage Page daily to receive flower after married
Tips: Wedding dinner can be placed after marriage, golds will be converted into dedication point after the wedding
Tips: The level of Elf’s Strorage, extra attribute can be activated when talent reaches a required level
Tips: Receive precious reward daily for 30 days after purchasing a Monthly Card
Tips: Activate Achievement Runes System when achievement【Punitive】is achieved
Tips: Activate Rank Medal System when military rank【Senior Sergeant】is achieved
Tips: Cross server Mirage Shrine event, top 3 places receive 10 times more rewards
